Title: Metro WPF
Description: Metro WPF provides a set of controls and styles for you to build your metro style WPF applications.
HomeWiki:
Metro WPF provides a set of controls and styles for you to build your metro style WPF applications.

Just released

Metro WPF version 1.0 is now available, you can download the library and use it in you WPF app.
This library is also available via NuGet.

Overview



Now you can use metro style in your WPF apps. Just add two resouce dictionaries into you application resources. For more details, see Using Metro Style in an Application in documentation page.

Future Release

  • Theme editor will be availiable in version 1.1
  • Metro animation behaviors are comming soon.
